title: Fasten Your Seatbelts
writer: Ferzan Ozpetek (story), Ferzan Ozpetek (screenplay), Gianni Romoli (screenplay)
actors: Kasia Smutniak, Francesco Arca, Filippo Scicchitano, Carolina Crescentini
plot: Elena (Kasia Smutniak) and Antonio (Francesco Arca) seem not to be made for each other. They are too different in terms of character, life choices, worldview, and the way they relate to ...
